channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 41 – Koh Phangan

item.title: By: Amit

item.description: I guess it is kind of drool-inducing :)
item.content:encoded: I guess it is kind of drool-inducing :)

item.title: By: Amit

item.description: No problem... going to take some pictures now
item.content:encoded: No problem… going to take some pictures now

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
Do you understand that your 7 readers are drooling all over their keyboards?
Please post some pictures, I'm interested to see what it looks like today -- when I was there, Paradise was a high-end place and there were no resorts...
item.content:encoded:
Do you understand that your 7 readers are drooling all over their keyboards?

Please post some pictures, I’m interested to see what it looks like today — when I was there, Paradise was a high-end place and there were no resorts…
